SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope that education becomes the single most valued part of our society…”

– Mr. Jeffrey Patrick, Technology Educator @PropelSchools @gcu @PittEducation https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/education-single-most-valued-part-society/
